title: Interpretation of terminology to be gender-neutral
context: [ยง572-1.8] Interpretation of terminology to be gender-neutral. When necessary to implement the rights, benefits, protections, and responsibilities of spouses under the laws of this State, all gender-specific terminology, such as &ldquo;husband&rdquo;, &ldquo;wife&rdquo;, &ldquo;widow&rdquo;, &ldquo;widower&rdquo;, or similar terms, shall be construed in a gender-neutral manner. This interpretation shall apply to all sources of law, including statutes, administrative rules, court decisions, common law, or any other source of law. [L Sp 2013 2d, c 1, pt of ยง2]
